SELECT A.* ,TO_CHAR(A.INS_INIT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INS_INIT_DATE_VIEW ,TO_CHAR(A.STND_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS STND_DT_VIEW ,TO_CHAR(A.STND_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS STND_DT_KEY ,TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS REG_DATE_VIEW FROM TB_CL_HT_DRIVING A WHERE 1=1
A.STND_DT = TO_DATE(#sStdDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
A.TMP_RACE_NUMBER = #sTmpNo#
A.TMP_RACE_AGENCY LIKE '%'||#"sTmpAg"#||'%'
A.REG_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE( #stdate# || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE( #eddate# || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
ORDER BY A.REG_DATE DESC

SELECT A.* ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.DRIVING_DIST_MON, 'YYYY-MM'), 'YYYY-MM') AS DRIVING_DIST_MON_VIEW FROM TB_CL_HT_AUTODRIVING A WHERE 1=1 AND A.TMP_RACE_NUMBER = #sTmpNo# AND A.STND_DT = TO_DATE(#sStdDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ORDER BY A.DRIVING_DIST_MON

SELECT A.* ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.CTR_CHANGE_MON, 'YYYY-MM'), 'YYYY-MM') AS CTR_CHANGE_MON_VIEW FROM TB_CL_HT_CTRCHANGE A WHERE 1=1 AND A.TMP_RACE_NUMBER = #sTmpNo# AND A.STND_DT = TO_DATE(#sStdDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ORDER BY A.CTR_CHANGE_MON

SELECT A.* ,TO_CHAR(A.CTR_CHANGE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CTR_CHANGE_DATE_VIEW FROM TB_CL_HT_CTRCHANGEDETAIL A WHERE 1=1 AND A.TMP_RACE_NUMBER = #sTmpNo# AND A.STND_DT = TO_DATE(#sStdDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ORDER BY A.CTR_CHANGE_DATE

SELECT A.* ,TO_CHAR(A.ACC_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS ACC_DATE_VIEW ,fn_ct_get_code_name('weather', A.WEATHER ) AS WEATHER_VIEW ,fn_ct_get_code_name('road_situation', A.ROAD_SITUATION ) AS ROAD_SITUATION_VIEW ,fn_ct_get_code_name('road_type_cd', A.ROAD_TYPE_CD ) AS ROAD_TYPE_CD_VIEW ,fn_ct_get_code_name('autocar_driving_mode', A.AUTOCAR_DRIVING_MODE ) AS AUTOCAR_DRIVING_MODE_VIEW ,fn_ct_get_code_name('autocar_driving_status_cd', A.AUTOCAR_DRIVING_STATUS_CD ) AS AUTOCAR_DRIVING_STATUS_CD_VIEW ,fn_ct_get_code_name('autocar_damage', A.AUTOCAR_DAMAGE ) AS AUTOCAR_DAMAGE_VIEW ,fn_ct_get_code_name('autocar_human_sex', A.AUTOCAR_HUMAN_SEX ) AS AUTOCAR_HUMAN_SEX_VIEW ,fn_ct_get_code_name('human_injury_type', A.HUMAN_INJURY_TYPE ) AS HUMAN_INJURY_TYPE_VIEW FROM TB_CL_HT_ACCIDENT A WHERE 1=1 AND A.ACC_ID = #sAccId#
A.TMP_RACE_NUMBER = #sTmpNo#
A.TMP_RACE_AGENCY LIKE '%'||#"sTmpAg"#||'%'
A.ACC_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE( #stdate# || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE( #eddate# || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
ORDER BY A.ACC_DATE DESC
